original_prompt.prompt: Create a compelling product description for a new eco-friendly water bottle. Highlight its sustainable features and unique selling points.

clarity.description: Evaluation of prompt clarity and specificity
suggestions: Add specific features and selling points to improve clarity

structure.description: Assessment of reasoning flow and organization
suggestions: Provide a structure for the description to follow
Include examples of features and selling points
Specify the desired length of the description
Consider providing specific examples and a structured format for the output

enhanced_prompt.prompt: Create a compelling product description (100-150 words) for a new eco-friendly water bottle. The description should be persuasive and highlight its sustainable features, such as [feature1], [feature2], and [feature3]. Also, emphasize unique selling points like [unique_selling_point1] and [unique_selling_point2]. Please provide a short JSON summary of the features and selling points after the description.
enhanced_prompt.highlighted_prompt: Create a compelling product description (100-150 words) for a new eco-friendly water bottle. The description should be persuasive and highlight its sustainable features, such as [feature1], [feature2], and [feature3]. Also, emphasize unique selling points like [unique_selling_point1] and [unique_selling_point2]. Please provide a short JSON summary of the features and selling points after the description.

clarity.description: Evaluation of prompt clarity and specificity
suggestions: Clarity has been improved with more specific details

structure.description: Assessment of reasoning flow and organization
suggestions: The flow has been reorganized for better logical progression
More relevant examples have been added to illustrate the points
Markdown formatting has been improved for better readability
The expected output format has been clarified
